title: To Catch a Thief
description: John Robie is a former jewel thief, formerly known as “The Cat,” who now spends his time tending to his rose garden in France. There is a series of jewel robberies on the Riviera that resemble his style and the police believe that the Cat is up to his old tricks again. A young lady vacationing in France suspects Robie at first, then offers to help him catch the burglar.
author: David Dodge
